entry.title: SNOWFALL WARNING , Musgrave Harbour
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 10:44 AM NST Friday 17 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: -1.2°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Pool's Island 11:30 AM NST Friday 17 February 2023
Temperature: -1.2°C
Pressure / Tendency: 100.6 kPa rising
Humidity: 59 %
Dewpoint: -8.1°C
Wind: 0 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Friday: Snow. Temperature steady near minus 2.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Snow beginning late this afternoon. Wind west 30 km/h gusting to 50 except gusting to 70 along parts of the coast near noon. Wind becoming light this afternoon. Temperature steady near minus 2. Wind chill near minus 9. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 11:00 AM NST Friday 17 February 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Snow at times heavy. Low minus 9.
entry.summary: Snow at times heavy. Amount 10 to 20 cm. Wind becoming north 20 km/h gusting to 40 near midnight. Low minus 9. Wind chill minus 7 this evening and minus 17 overnight. Forecast issued 11:00 AM NST Friday 17 February 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Periods of snow. Temperature falling to minus 12 in the afternoon.
entry.summary: Periods of snow ending in the afternoon then cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries. Amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind north 20 km/h gusting to 40. Temperature falling to minus 12 in the afternoon. Wind chill near minus 20. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 11:00 AM NST Friday 17 February 2023
